short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Guardian. News, sport and opinion from the Guardian's International edition

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Guardian International is a Chrome extension that allows quick access to The Guardian's International web page. Stay up-to-date with news, sport, and opinion, and enable or disable notifications about new news with the 'do not disturb' mode settings.

Always be informed with our extension for The Guardian International
